name: Forsaken Feelings
description:
Follow the adventure of an artist trapped in his own work!

How To Play

Arrow keys to move around and jump, F, D and Q to use your powers.

The Story

China, 1967. A virus spreads into the country. To avoid it, you must go outside. But an artist continues to work at home. What will happen to him?

Other Things

Made in about two weeks for the 51th Mini Jam!
